body_content.explanation: one thing that can be chosen from a set of possibilities, or the freedom to make a choice:
examples: The best option would be to cancel the trip altogether.
There are various options open to someone who is willing to work hard.
They didn't leave him much option - either he paid or they'd beat him up.

body_content.explanation: the right to buy something in the future:
examples: The publishers decided not to take up their option on the paperback version.

body_content.explanation: to have to do a particular thing because there is no possibility of doing anything else:
examples: After her appalling behaviour, we had no option but to dismiss her.
